title: Arsenal joined by Manchester United in pursuing Samuel Castillejo transfer
text:
Samuel Castillejo has been in impressive form this season (Picture: Getty) Arsenal are reportedly among a number of clubs, including rivals Manchester United and Manchester City , chasing the transfer of Villarreal winger Samuel Castillejo.
Arsenal v City, Merseyside Derby - 5 reasons to be excited as the Premier League returns The 22-year-old wide-man has been in fine form in La Liga this season, contributing three goals and four assists in all competitions to get bigger clubs interested.
According to reports in Italy, Napoli look to be the main front-runners for the Spaniard’s signature at the moment, but he also seems to have suitors in the Premier League.
Castillejo has caught the eye with Villarreal (Picture: Getty) Arsenal face the prospect of losing Alexis Sanchez this summer and could do with Castillejo’s quality in attack if that happens, while United have also been somewhat lacking in that area.

The Red Devils have been overly reliant on Zlatan Ibrahimovic for moments of inspiration this season, and may be tempted to raid Villarreal again after the success of last summer’s signing Eric Bailly.
According to Il Mattino , Arsenal, United and City are the three English clubs showing an interest in signing Castillejo this summer.
